main_section:
About us

SH was established in 1975 as Système Huntington Inc. (Sh [i]) and was initially specialized in the design and construction of showrooms and their components. With the mission of enhancing the value of branded environments, the company quickly became a leading provider of innovative graphic solutions.

ALTO™
& FOLIA™, our personalized surface materials products, have enabled us to build various architectural elements which create durable and unique spaces. Today, we group together our offer of graphic and architectural solutions under the SH Immersive Environments brand name and we employ close to 50 employees. Our sales network extends across Canada, the United States and internationally.
